definition: characterized by painstaking care and detailed examination, distance measured by the time taken to cover it
details:
adjective
- characterized by painstaking care and detailed examination
= example: characterized by painstaking care and detailed examination
= synonyms: narrow
- infinitely or immeasurably small
= example: infinitely or immeasurably small
= synonyms: infinitesimal
noun
- distance measured by the time taken to cover it
= synonyms: hour
- a short note
= example: a short note
- a unit of angular distance equal to a 60th of a degree
= synonyms: arcminute, minute of arc
- a unit of time equal to 60 seconds or 1/60th of an hour
= example: a unit of time equal to 60 seconds or 1/60th of an hour
= synonyms: min
- a particular point in time
= synonyms: second
- an indefinitely short time
= synonyms: second
